data.title: Return to Silent Hill
data.meta_description: Director Christophe Gans delves back into the eerie world of Silent Hill with a new movie adaptation of the popular psychological horror game, Silent Hill 2.
data.text:
2 months, 2 weeks

How Silent Hill Paved the Way for the Video Game Adaptation Craze

Why Christophe Gans’ 2006 film was one of the first good game movies.

2 months, 2 weeks

Silent Hill Transmission: Everything Announced

So much Silent Hill to look forward to.

2 months, 2 weeks

Silent Hill Transmission Announced For May 30 With 'Game Updates, a Deeper Look at the Film, and New Merch'

Could we see more of Silent Hill 2 Remake, Return to Silent Hill, Silent Hill f, AND Silent Hill: Townfall?

2 months, 4 weeks

Return to Silent Hill Movie Unveils First Look at Pyramid Head

Things are starting to take shape.

1 year, 4 months

Return to Silent Hill Movie Will Star Jeremy Irvine as James, Filming Begins Next Month

Hannah Emily Anderson is also taking a lead role.

1 year, 9 months

Return to Silent Hill - Official Announcement Featurette

Join film director and producer Christophe Gans, and producer Victor Hadida to learn more about Return to Silent Hill - a new movie adaptation of the popular psychological horror game, Silent Hill 2. The film tells the story of a young man who is returning to Silent Hill to search for his wife, Mary. Here's a detailed look at how it's being adapted into a film, from redesigning its creepy monsters to capturing the original …
